response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which holds immense value to us. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity, considering the product's true worth is $1,000,000. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
